about_the_game:
Explore an alien world

Brace yourself for a riotous journey exploring an alien planet in this uproarious sci-fi brawler!
Engage in dynamic battles, unleash strange powers, master quirky challenges, and navigate the cosmic absurdity that unfolds at every turn. Uncover the planet's secrets, adapt to its challenges, and become the ultimate champion in an intergalactic showdown!

Survive traps and enemies

Navigate through hilarious traps and face off against quirky enemies with unexpected antics where laughter meets mayhem. Overcome eccentric challenges, and discover the laughter-infused chaos that awaits. Can you outwit the comical traps and emerge victorious in this cosmic carnival of surprises?

Be the last one standing

Being the last player standing in Galactico is your only ticket to victory! Can you triumph amidst the hilarity and emerge as the undisputed champion of this comically chaotic galaxy? Outwit and outlast your opponents embracing the hilarity of the struggle to emerge as the sole survivor in a crazy fast competition of wit and endurance. Will you be the ultimate victor in this laughter-infused quest for supremacy?

name: Galactico

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on epic battles in GALACTICO, the exhilarating slap-em-up platformer! Throw down with friends in dynamic remote clashes or enjoy uproarious mayhem on a single screen. Can you be the sole winner in this cosmic arena?
